thread.title: Chervonne Chandler

author: Chervonne Chandler
title: Chervonne Chandler
text: I usually do not enjoy speaking to reps or connecting services during a move, but the customer service rep that I spoke with (I believe his name was Justin Vann?) made the process seamless. There was no pressure! He was knowledgeable, friendly and took his time to make sure that I completely understood the coverage that Verizon offered so i could choose the best packages for my family! I would recommend Verizon to anyone!
